text: Olav Magnar Odden (28 September 1914 - 28 January 1969) was a Norwegian skier from Folldal. He competed in cross-country skiing and Nordic combined at the 1948 Winter Olympics. He was Norwegian champion in 30 km in 1938 and a winner in Nordic combined in Holmenkollen in 1946. ==Cross-country skiing results== ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text- align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 18 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1948 || 33 || 14 || — || — |- |} ===World Championships=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background- color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 18 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1938 || 23 ||53 ||— ||— |- | 1939 || 24 ||21 ||— ||4 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1914 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Folldal Category:Norwegian male cross-country skiers Category:Norwegian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Norway Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Norway Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics
